description: This Kotlin source file defines a singleton object `SampleRepository` that acts as an in-memory, static repository for media content categories, including recommended, top picks, recently added, and various genre-specific lists. It provides methods to access categories, media items by ID, and search functionality, with data comprising media metadata and URLs for images.

classes.name: UrlItem
classes.description: Data class representing a media item's metadata, including ID, title, overview, category, and image URLs.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: Data class representing a category of media items, with a name and list of MediaItem objects.

classes.name: MediaItem
classes.description: Data class representing a media item's details used across the repository, including resource IDs, URLs, and metadata.

methods.name: toMediaItem
methods.description: Extension function converting UrlItem to MediaItem, incorporating resource placeholders and metadata.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: Returns the list of all media categories with their items.

methods.name: recommended
methods.description: Returns the list of recommended media items.

methods.name: topPicks
methods.description: Returns the list of top pick media items.

methods.name: recentlyAdded
methods.description: Returns the list of recently added media items.

methods.name: sciFi
methods.description: Returns the list of Sci-Fi genre media items.

methods.name: horror
methods.description: Returns the list of Horror genre media items.

methods.name: child
methods.description: Returns the list of Child genre media items.

methods.name: romantic
methods.description: Returns the list of Romantic genre media items.

methods.name: thriller
methods.description: Returns the list of Thriller genre media items.

methods.name: bannerBackgrounds
methods.description: Returns a list of URLs for banner background images.

methods.name: byId
methods.description: Finds a media item by its ID; returns null if not found.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches across all media items for the query in title or overview, case-insensitive.
